website_summaries.verdict: Although marketed toward men, this exfoliating bar soap is great for anyone who wants smoother skin and a plant-based, premium soap.
pros: All natural, made with plant-based ingredients like green tea and willow bark
Made in the USA and it's cruelty free, and does not contain any chemicals
Subtle musk scent appeals to most people, of any gender
Charitable company donates a bar of soap for every purchase to Clean the World
cons: Exfoliates, so not ideal if you want a smooth bar of soap or need a moisturizing formula
May not be suitable for sensitive or damaged skin

customer_reviews.title: Made for MEN but can be used by tough WoMEN.
customer_reviews.text: Use to buy it at Target like many have stated and was bummed when they stopped selling it. Happy they started selling it on Amazon. It is a very rough exfoliating soap marketed towards Men, probably because of its rough grittiness. I mean this thing is close to sandpaper rough which is what I want after a long hard day of work. As an HVAC technician I have to crawl into dirty old attics as well as under houses at times, this soap scrubs off all the dirt like nothing and leaves me squeaky clean. I stocked up as soon as I saw it was availabe on Amazon and will continue to purchase in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 3,012,463

customer_reviews.title: I''m Hooked - this is the best exfoliating soap I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I have probably tried about 10 different exfoliating soaps and this is the best by far. If you sweat a lot like I do, you need a soap that's going to lather well and scrub off the caked on dirt. Other brands I've tried just couldn't get the caked on dirt washed off. If you want a real effective exfoliating soap, I would give this a try. Some of the other "scented" soaps smell like a bottle of Old Spice was dumped into the soap. Luckily, this is fragrance free. Also, the price for a 7oz bar is about 40% less than other brands. Good price, great soap
customer_reviews.author: Saul F

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I confess. I really like the scrub exfoliant type soap bars. I have tried a few different types and through the years have continued to buy the Kiehl's Ultimate Man exfoliant type soap bar. However, THIS Marlowe soap bar is GREAT and it was a great price online. The texture is perfect. The scrub is great. The scent is a very pleasant and not overwhelming scent. I would absolutely continue to use it and buy more of it if it was available. At the moment it appears to be unavailable. I will continue to look for it though.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lawhorn

customer_reviews.title: but so happy when Amazon started selling
customer_reviews.text: Never got this excited over a soap before...but this one will do you in. I was so bummed when a retailer, mentioned above, stopped selling this soap, but so happy when Amazon started selling. Had to stock up. Amazing soap. Simply amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: As good as advertised, this will be the only bar of soap I use for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.text: This will feel like sandpaper at first, but you will feel cleaner than ever and within a week you will wonder why you've been using inferior soap for your entire life. I have never once in my life talked to my brother about grooming products, but I went out of my way to tell him about this little miracle bar of soap.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Summers

customer_reviews.title: I love this soap - never let it go away!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this soap. First got it at Target in late 2015 and then all of a sudden it was out of their stores and I couldn't track it down. All of a sudden it showed up on Amazon and I've been purchasing it from here ever since. The bar is a little on the big side until you use it the first few time but smells and feels great. I purchase these 3-5 at a time and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: BrianInChicago

customer_reviews.title: This soap is a revelation
customer_reviews.text: I must say, this soap is a revelation. I am actually writing this review in a towel right now because I just showered and I'm euphoric about how smooth my skin feels after using it. It was rougher than I expected, and it does feel a bit like sandpaper on the skin BUT the resulting smoothness and nice aromas are worth it. I have bad keratosis pilaris on my upper arms (aka chicken skin) and this soap was nicely exfoliating without causing irritation. Other rough soaps have left my skin red and blotchy whereas my skin feels like it's breathing after using No. 102. I'm worried I can no longer use any other soap...
customer_reviews.author: meddlesome

customer_reviews.title: Actually does what it says: Exfoliates!
customer_reviews.text: Man, it's actually a little ridiculous how long it took me to find a good bar soap that both cleans and actually Exfoliates instead of claiming it does while giving you the equivalent of 2 or 3 pieces of sand stuck in your bar of soap. This bar is hefty, and rough. Tbh it almost is painful so be a little gentle when wiping sensitive areas with the bar, it feels like I'm rubbing lubricated sandpaper all over my body, and that's exactly what I wanted. I feel so clean after showers it's crazy. The scent is pretty good. It's said to be masculine, but it smells more like a musky citrus, which imo is unisex.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Williams

customer_reviews.title: Ruff Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have a Love/Hate relationship with this soap. It is a very abrasive soap, and sometimes I can't handle it. But when I get really dirty or grimy and feel the need to get a good scrubbing it is the soap I prefer if I don't have access to a scrubby or scrunchy (whatever it's called). Like the scent, and I feel it lasts long (may be because I do not use everyday). Not recommended on sun burned or sensitive skin. Okay price, but if it were less I would definitely buy more often.
customer_reviews.author: EricJM

customer_reviews.title: Want more of this soap
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews say its too rough to use daily but I find its just right. I did get another bar with moisturizer but havent really needed it. I went with this as an alternative to the more expensive ones and was very pleased with this one as it lasts longer, the smell doesnt over power and is mute if anything so it doesnt fight with your cologne, and leaves with a very clean feeling. Went to get another bar and see that its no longer available so thats disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Rough tough soap for men who get dirty
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap. Its aimed at men and I can see why. The bar is very rough like sand paper. I am a plumber and can get dirty at times and this very rough soap gets me very very clean. Also I have seen that it's been helpful with my dry skin on my feet too. The smell of the soap is a little strong but other den dat it's great and I'll be reordering very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: 102 is the best exfoliating soap bar by far
customer_reviews.text: I have used kiehl's ultimate body scrub soap bar for years and also have tried jack black turbo body bar a couple of times. Marlowe No. 102 is the best exfoliating soap bar by far. Dry skin will scrub away easily especially in tough spots like your lower legs, feet and back of your arms. If you've never used an exfoliating soap before, this might be too intense of a scrub for you, start with kiehl's or jack black. I prefer the scent of the kiehl's soap but that won't affect my rating of Marlowe. The Marlowe scent doesn't linger so It doesn't bother me. Another plus is this soap is $9 less than what I'm used to paying!
customer_reviews.author: Arnell Ballesil

customer_reviews.title: Still on the first bar!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! First bar has been lasting longer than many of the other bar soaps I've used. Nice exfoliating action and smells nice (and leaves a nice scent in my bathroom). Doesn't seem to dry my skin out like some of the other soaps out there. The only negative observation I've had is that it likes to collect my hair as I use it. After doing washing my chest, arms and armpits, I have a fair amount of hair on the bar mixed in with the exfoliating particles. It doesn't seem to diminish the soap's ability, just might be unsightly to someone other than the user. Doesn't bother me, just wanted to put it out there.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Chmielewski

customer_reviews.title: Looking For A Truly Exfoliating Bar Soap? This Is The Crowned King.
customer_reviews.text: I like rough soaps. Like, really rough. Whenever I'm in a random farmer's market, I always look for that obscure custom soap booth. Sometimes there will be a really gritty soap that works amazingly but that you can never seem to find again or they decided to stop making. Behold, the Marlowe men's Body Scrub. The best way to describe this soap is... amorphous 120 grit sandpaper. It's downright skin abusing, dry skin removing, seriously aggressive awesomeness. And it's f-ing amazing. The smell is just perfect. Slightest earthy scent that doesn't linger. This is soap for men of men.
customer_reviews.author: Herbitronics

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this soap
customer_reviews.text: The Marlowe 102 is awesome, especially after a hot workout where the exfoliating scrub really leaves you feeling clean. The scrub is not too harsh and leaves me feeling refreshed. Showering with this really makes me feel cleaner than the usual moisturizing soap I have been using. This is truly a case of getting what you paid for. High quality and an overall great product. Very glad a friend suggested this and the other Marlowe products.
customer_reviews.author: K. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Soap? More like a portable spa! Good for ladies too if you like the scent
customer_reviews.text: I never liked bar soap until now. The natural exfoliator is scratchy but feels amazing. It has nearly eliminated any follicle bumps on my thighs after 3mo of use. This soap is very fragrant. Definitely "masculine," but natural. I tend to like herb, wood, and tea-tree scents so I have no problem using it. Rinses off very well and leaves a clean feeling. I wouldn't say it's particularly moisturizing. My skin runs dry, so I just rotate with another moisturizing soap. I got this soap as a gift, fell in love, got one for a friend, who also loved it. 5 stars in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: Not great for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This was not for me, and I wouldn't recommend for sensitive skin. It smells like that powder used to scrub bathrooms, Comet. Not something very refreshing or comfortable to smell in a bath soap! It also was really drying and irritating on my skin, both from the exfoliant effect, and I think also from the chemicals. I can't rate the longevity because I used it only a couple of times before wasting the bar in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Bumblebee

customer_reviews.title: Sandpaper for your morning!
customer_reviews.text: Looked at this and thought, man with this many great reviews this must be fantastic! Boy was I wrong...this is straight up sandpaper soap. Not like that soap that has some pumice soap. Straight up SANDPAPER. Avoid at all costs. It hurts to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Graves

customer_reviews.title: Hurts so good
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the people that said "ow it hurt" or "oh it's too scratchy" were the same people who complain about Taco Bell hot sauce being too hot. I wanted a soap to scratch the **** out of me, and by God, it did. Use small gentle circles at first if it's too much, but then after a while, it just hurts so good. The guy who rated this 3 stars does this product a disservice. He shoulda known what he was getting into. This has worked wonders on by back and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Hal Reid

customer_reviews.title: Too much grit...
customer_reviews.text: This particular bar of soap is like 80 grain sand paper with heavier chunks mixed in.... Now I don't mind a bit of exfoliate.....but this particular bar could be used to sand wood..... Too much....to the point that stepping back into my shower after use is like walking on eggshells....tiny bits of grit....oh it will wake you up....but I prefer enjoying my bathing experience....
customer_reviews.author: Coffeeman

customer_reviews.title: Save face and get a bar
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using something like this. I consider myself a kinda manlyish man, x-military, x-athlete. And then mid-30s caught up to me and my skin started to look old. I have sensitive-ish skin. That being said, I can scrub my face with this bar and not get a rash or even that red after use. I do notice CLEANER pores, and healthier looking skin. Now, this will dry your skin out after use... use lotion. Problem solved. Also, this smells pretty good. Way to go on creating a manly exfoliating bar! I’ll probably order again in a year when this bar finally runs out! It’s huge!
customer_reviews.author: ChadWick

customer_reviews.title: Best clean and skin feels great super rough soap but feels good
customer_reviews.text: So 1st off everybody should know this soap is rough definitely very grainy like a stone or sand paper it will soften up after time but personally I love it kinda hurt at 1st( im aggressive scrubber) but it feels good and I actually feel cleaner using it compared to other bars it also quite a nice size lasted a bit over a month for me showered daily. My only complaint is the scent is light or nothing at all for me personally I wouldn't mind having some scent options otherwise most will like its extremely light scent. All in all I love it but would love some other scents!
customer_reviews.author: Tuxedo Man

customer_reviews.title: Good smell and Exofoliation
customer_reviews.text: After wasting money on Dr. Squatch soap I decided to try Marlowe. Hands down the Marlowe exfoliating bar soap is the Best I ever used. Smells great and lasts for a long time. The exfoliating sand grit removes stubborn dirt from yard work. The large bar size lasts for a good week or so. My only beef with this bar soap is the cost. It would absolutely be the all around BEST soap if it were priced under $5.00 per 7oz bar.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Smells fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Bar soap is my preferred way to wash and I wanted to try something new from the big brands like dial/old spice/dove that you see in every store who haven’t changed their soap model for, well, my entire life. I loved this soap so much that I ended up putting it on a monthly subscription. It lathers up great, smells amazing, and like other users have said, the rough “sandpaper” feel of the soap gives me a better sense of clean for some reason. My only issue is that $8 is a steep price for a bar of soap.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Hollis Ottaway

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for Meh Soap
customer_reviews.text: I love a good exfoliating soap, however this one is a little extreme for me. I could have used some sandpaper from the garage and it would have done the same thing. I also had to cut the bar of soap in half to use it because the original one was so big and hard to use in the shower. It dried out my skin, and the smell didn't last long. I wouldn't say it's an awful product, but it's definitely not as good as you would hope for as much as it costs.
customer_reviews.author: Ian B

customer_reviews.title: Best soap "bar none"..
customer_reviews.text: This soap is absolutely fantastic. Its an exfoliating soap that is somewhat coarse so keep that in mind, but feels awesome on your body. Scent is great but not overpowering. One of the best things about this soap is that it is extremely dense. What I mean is that this soap lasts for a while. Unlike Dove Men's, which last about a week, Marlowe Men's last a very long time and is worth the price. Cant say enough good things about this soap as I just purchased another bar.
customer_reviews.author: Gallopo Family

customer_reviews.title: Great soap but borderline expensive
customer_reviews.text: This soap is great! It's a little pricey and, with daily use, one bar lasts me about 3 weeks. The Earthy Oud Wood scent is amazing! This is not to say that the original doesn't smell good too, but a combination of the texture and scent reminds me of powder laundry detergent. Like other reviews stated, it is abrasive, but you do get used to it. My only complaint, aside from price, is that if you're hairy this soap will be hairy too.
customer_reviews.author: Luis83

customer_reviews.title: It's nice but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Soap smells really nice and is not overpowering. Rough at first but you learn to relish it when you're using it. Genuinely liked the soap, but for the price it needed to last longer than it did. 7.99 for a bar of soap that lasts the same amount of time as a generic brand of soap isn't cutting it for me. Would order again at some point if I can justify spending the money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Klein

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved!
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES this soap! I got it for him as a stocking stuffer and he raved about it it for weeks after Christmas. I had to feel his skin at least two times a day because he was so in love with how soft it made it! It has a very pleasant light smell. He said it is pretty scratchy to use, almost like sandpaper, but if you are looking for a good scrub/exfoliation, than this is the thing! My husband said it makes him feel really clean! He wants to try more of their products!
customer_reviews.author: Keela

customer_reviews.title: Extreme scent
customer_reviews.text: The soap seems to be a good exfoliating soap, but the scent is extremely overwhelming. So much so, I will be throwing the bar away.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: My special occasion soap.
customer_reviews.text: Im not in the business of constantly buying 9.00 bars of soap, so i keep this one in my little travel soap container for special occasions. Its a large bar, with noticeable, hard, exfoliation powder ground up. Its definitely a SCRUB. When my elbows, knees, heels, look a little ashy, dry, I use this soap. Fresh smell that doesnt overshadow my other grooming products. I almost wish there was a body spray of this scent. Due to the coarseness of the grit in the soap, I dont think its for everyday use for me. But it can be for others. Solid, good quality soap.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Soap soap don’t forget the soap
customer_reviews.text: Bought this six months ago and still using the soap. No doubt this soap is worth every penny. I have noticed a marked difference in my skin since I started using it. My skin is not dry and even looks better. It would be nice if the bars were a little smaller and be prepared for it to almost hurt The first few times you use it but what’s a little pain in exchange for good exfoliation, right?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most thorough and effective exfoliating bar I’ve used, “bar” none
customer_reviews.text: This bar is not for the faint of heart (or skin), but that’s meant to be a compliment. It is a rough, thorough exfoliant that, unlike all previous similar products I’ve tried, actually exfoliates/works for the entire duration of the bar, not just the first few uses of it. This is because there are exfoliating “granules” dispersed through the entire bar, not just the first couple layers of it, like most similar products. Highly effective for achieving smoother skin, but due to its high intensity, definitely not for everyday use!
customer_reviews.author: Chaz Bee

customer_reviews.title: Do not let the title of the scent fool you too
customer_reviews.text: Do not be fooled by title of scent. It may clean ok but I didn't give it a second shower to find out. I couldn't get past the smell. Not a manly woodsy smell tlike the description leads you to believe. If you like squatch cedar citrus or crate 61 alpine and spice, due cannon campfire or their pine scented one, do not think this is anything like that. This is a soapy smelling soap. Almost feminine. "no sir! I don't like it"
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Best soap ever!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 6 star if they had one !!! It is so wonderful, I know it’s for men and I bought my sons each one and myself one . I love this soap , I can not wait to shower and use it. It leaves my skin so soft and the exfoliating feels amazing!! Definitely I must have in the bathroom!!
customer_reviews.author: patty bumgardner

customer_reviews.title: Best soap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who has extremely dry skin, and who also gets a lot of build up on his skin from his job. We’ve bought a variety of soaps and this one was simply the best. Not only did it remove the dirt from his skin, but left it feeling very moisturized and not dry. I would highly recommend this soap to anyone who needs a good deep cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: CLEANS, without drying out skin. Feels natural
customer_reviews.text: You remember that episode of SpongeBob?When he rubbed those pickles together and it made that squeaky noise he was so fond of? Imagine that but on skin. Me and my girlfriend have been using it for 3 days and are completely fascinated by how it cleans without drying your skin out. I break out from too much moisturizing, and also if I dry it out too much. This is a great between. It smells like classic potpourri with a hint of Christmas. But is not fragrant afterwards if that's what your looking for. Bar soap is back and this is where you should start. I am looking forward to more of this products' releases in the future
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Shoup

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this soap (it really is high quality, cleans well, and smells good) but I just can’t get over the flaws. First off, this soap caused me to become extremely itchy. I’ve never had this happen with other soap, so one of the ingredients must react with my skin. Secondly, the exfoliating effect is very pronounced. So much so that it feels like using 60 grit sandpaper. It definitely cleans well, but I can’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Elbers

customer_reviews.title: Dry and TOO ROUGH
customer_reviews.text: I almost never write reviews, but I was so disappointed with this soap, here I am. Dries out the skin and so painful! I thought my sensitive husband, who I bought the soap for, was exaggerating, but I tried it and it's terrible! And I like a good exfoliating scrub. I would use it on my callused heels, but I don't like the dryness it leaves on my hands. I wouldn't use it even if I fell into a port-a-potty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT !
customer_reviews.text: Great product ! Not only will you feel CLEAN ! it has a great scent that is not overpowering . Without wearing any cologne I could smell it on me all day very light . No slimy after feeling or dry skin . I was tired of buying the products like zest that the bars keep shrinking and are filled with Who knows what . This is my first bar so will see how it last. It is a little gritty , not a problem for me you can lather in your hands if it’s to rough for your skin . I personally like it for scrubbing feet after wearing work boots all day .
customer_reviews.author: joe amador

customer_reviews.title: Are you like me?
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever been sanding a table and thought, “I wish I could use this sandpaper on my junk.” Well look no further! The love child of a bar of dove soap and 120 grit sandpaper. The Marlowe bar allows you to feel like a carpenter while naked in the shower. Highly recommended to any man/woman looking for an aggressive bar of soap that will leave you skin free with the satisfaction of sanding a tabletop.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great soap! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Dove for men. I have now switched to the Marlowe bars. This last longer then other soaps and has a sent that lasts! I even tried the Dr. Squanch bars (totally not worth the money for Dr. Squanch bar) these Marlowe bars are way better! So, if you want a good smelling, long lasting bar of soap, Marlowe is for you! 1 drawback to the Marlowe 102 is that it is not for sensitive skin as the abrasive materials they put in to scrub is really coarse.
customer_reviews.author: Nonya B

customer_reviews.title: The reviews are real!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical as the reviews were to good for a product I've never heard of. Let me say now they were all right. The scent is great and I can smell it throughout my apartment after a shower. After a few pass of the skin it goes from smooth to coarse and you know its exfoliating. I wish it last longer I may have another 2wks left with it which would be about 3wks total so pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Not your dad’s bar of soap.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use it every day because it’s very abrasive. It helps with my acne I use it on my face some and I love it. I will be purchasing again. I have used some other products made by this company and not liked them But this is the bar soap I never knew I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Soap that Works
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend had some issues with body acne on his lower back. Cream body wash was not doing much to help the problem so he tried this exfoliating soap. It helped remove the dead skin and oils that were getting trapped and the acne cleared up. It also smells very nice and earthy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bonneau

customer_reviews.title: Best soap ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used many different soaps in my 49 years and I can honestly say this stuff is by far the best. Great scent, nice exfoliation without being to rough and most importantly, it gets you super clean! I cannot recommend this soap highly enough and that’s the honest truth. I will never use any other brand ever again. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Judd Dvorak

customer_reviews.title: Shower time hits different !
customer_reviews.text: Took a shot on this sfter reading others reviews. This bar of soap is slightly larger than normal bars of soap. Now I have never used an exfoliating bar soap and so that sandpaper to skin sensation shocked me the first time but now I look forward to it! Lol This soap lather very well and smells good with a tinge of oatmeal but rinses very clean and leave you feeling clean! I'm a fan. However I probably should skip a day with it? I'll do my research lol
customer_reviews.author: Jussy

customer_reviews.title: This is a Manly Men's Soap
customer_reviews.text: I'd have to admit that this is a Manly Men's soap. I wouldn't suggest this for those who have sensitive skin. This really exfoliates the skin and smells really well. I have been looking for a soap like this for a while now -- something I could 2-3 times a week in addition to using Dove moisturizing soap that I've been using for years since I was a child. Dove's recent exfoliating soap is good but I don't feel it does enough because of the fact that their reputation is to moisturize (often sensitive) skin.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite soap
customer_reviews.text: During the first use, I was skeptical because of the rough nature of the pecan "powder" in the soap, but now it's part of what I look forward to the most. I joke it's like washing with 60 grit sandpaper, but it really feels great. It rinses off really well, and my skin no longer itches and doesn't feel dried out after a shower. I like the scent, and it also makes the bathroom smell manly instead of flowery.
customer_reviews.author: KarlwithaK

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t dry out the skin and smells light and clean!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a stocking stuffer for my husband. I wasn’t sure he’d like it and I wasn’t sure either of us would like the smell. But the smell is very nice. It’s light and clean but still masculine. Also, the soap doesn’t dry out his skin like body wash does, which has been an added bonus! I think this will be his new soap forever he likes it so much. Especially since bar soap lasts far longer than shower gel.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Smoothest skin I've had yet
customer_reviews.text: I've always spent extra on face wash and moisturizer but never really could justify spending more on bar soap. I had to write this review to say that I've been missing out for so long and I'm glad I finally did. Scrub hard, remove all the grime and dead skin, and you'll get out of the shower feeling a lot more confident in how your skin feels. Also, the smell is incredible! I hope this one never gets discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Robb

customer_reviews.title: Best soap I have found
customer_reviews.text: For years I have tried many different brands with no success. I have sensitive skin and foliculitice and most soap make things worse. This is the best soap I have ever tried!! Smells good,cleans good and good moisturizer. I highly recommend if you have sensitive skin issues
customer_reviews.author: kyle h.

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliating grit
customer_reviews.text: The grit in the Marlowe bar (is it sand or pumice?) is rougher than I like when using the bar directly on my skin. Not unlike using a "sandpaper block" as many have noted. If I lather the soap and apply it to my skin without using the bar the soap is fine. Somehow, the grit feels more concentrated on the bar and less so in the lather. Otherwise, a pretty good soap; it lasts awhile and is good-sized for the money. Perhaps they should offer one Marlowe bar with "mild exfoliating texture" and "the original." I'll try another brand before reordering this one.
customer_reviews.author: Herodotus

customer_reviews.title: More than I wanted to pay, but worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I have really bad skin. It gets oily and flakey, and previous to this purchase, I wasn't helping the situation by using harsh, non-abrasive commercial soaps. This stuff does the trick. It's super rough, but the soap, itself, doesn't damage my skin at all. It smells great, and the bars have lasted me much longer than normal dial or ivory bars. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Crabrangoon

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome exfoliating soap! I was buying the Perfectly Posh Snarky bars and they stopped making most scents and were charging $16/bar plus shipping! I found these on amazon and they seemed to be the only one with consistent reviews about the exfoliation aspect. The scent is nice and not so strong that it would off putting. It’s more fresh rather than manly, but definitely not floral or vanilla. I like it so much I have it ok subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Sara L.

customer_reviews.title: Soap. An American Story
customer_reviews.text: I first started using this thing called 'soap' back in the early 90's. Some friends had tried it and offered me some. Well, what can i say, it was the 90's. I got hooked. Fast forward 30 years. I still use soap but now it's fancy expensive soap. It exfoliates. I guess... not sure what that means exactly but I'm glad I'm exfoliated. Smells okay. I recommend this soap if you're looking to buy soap.
customer_reviews.author: Rockulus

customer_reviews.title: This stuff Smells good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, the bars are larger than your average bar by almost double, they are also very much exfoliating. They are better than any product I've used for scrubbing short of that Lava soap stuff. Great deal overall. Smells a bit strong while showering but as you get out you have a nice faint smell of pleasure lingering around your body. Attracts your mate because she likes the smell. She basically really likes the smell. Which is what matters. Want to attract your mate? Buy this. She likes the smell. (They cant tell you are ugly if you smell nice)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Estrella

customer_reviews.title: Marlowe Soap
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this soap. It smells great, decently lasting, adequate size etc... My one and only gripe is that the pumice granules make it uncomfortably abrasive, and it has a lot of them. If you have sensitive skin you may want to consider a different product. I don’t know if they offer the same soap without the pumice. If they did I would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My man is a diesel tech, he always comes home covered in oil and all kinds of nasty mess, even after he has washed up. I bought this for him for Christmas and he adores it! Works on the whole body! Isn’t too rough but is absolutely better than regular soap. I even use it when I want to exfoliate 😌.
customer_reviews.author: Katlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bar of soap. Great purchase size and longevity is worth the price. Awesome scent citrus scrub with royal pine tree scent original and classic clean. Leave skin feeling smooth, build a great lather without using up to much soap strong scrubby and sturdy. Highly recommend it enjoyable to the max. Feels like a brick of marvelous lather. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Joey Costales

customer_reviews.title: Finally, A Soap For A Man!
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap! Looked for a long time to find a soap that would scrub and exfoliate well. This is the perfect soap. Not gonna lie, it is gritty, but is exactly what is needed to get clean and exfoliated. Smells great too! I’ve been using this soap for nearly a year and have no plans to switch ever again. Buy with confidence, you’ll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: TiltedHaloGoods

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This soap is amazing I have combination skin (dry oily skin) and if you have this you know that it's a battle to keep your skin both flake free and oil free but this seems to work great it's a little hard but that's good to take the buildup on my face off honestly I've never felt my face so soft after using this it also has a slight moisturizing effect that's not to heavy. Overall I highly recommend buying this it's great I'm looking forward to trying the other products they offer.
customer_reviews.author: Eliseo Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love. Love, Love this soap. I’ve tried many at different price ranges and this one is by far the best. I wish it came in different fragrances since I’m not as impressed with the smell but it is the BEST scrubbing and LONGEST LASTING bar of soap I’ve ever used. I can live with the smell since it’s performance is outstanding and the price is fair. I just bought 4 more bars and when I run out I’ll definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Bell 430 pilot

customer_reviews.title: Good soap
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bar of soap. It smells good while using it in the shower but the scent doesn’t stay on you, which Is good in my opinion. It’s abrasive so it can be used as a body bar. Treat yourself, and it actually lasted quite a while too..
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Big bar of soap with excellent exfoliation and great scent
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap - it's a big bar, has excellent scrubbing capability and smells awesome! It is pretty coarse, and exfoliates very well! It really helps to wake you up with a good scrubbing! The scent is manly, and invigorating. Although it does cost quite a bit for a bar of soap, it lasts a long time. For me, a single bar lasts about 3 months and that's with daily showers (maybe 2 in the summer) per day.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Christ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good exfoliating scrub for men and was not happy with the products offered at the pharmacy. I saw this product and it’s great rating and thought I would give it a try. Who would have thought that an inexpensive simple bar soap could be so perfect, it scrubs and when finished you feel clean and fresh. I have since then purchased this for my son.
customer_reviews.author: joe q

customer_reviews.title: Great exfoliating shower bar
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time today. Left my skin feeling soft and did not dry my skin out. Huge bar that should last quite a while. Feels like sandpaper at first but it gets better as you keep scrubbing. And that’s kind of the point of an exfoliating bar. It has a nice scent in the shower but you won’t smell like much of anything when you dry off. Just feel clean, but not frangrant.
customer_reviews.author: John h

customer_reviews.title: Great soap all natural and made in the USA.
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought the dr. Squatch soap d loved how clean it made me feel, but the smell had much to be desired. This soap s much better scent wise. Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: This product is not for "sensitive" skin, i assume it's asking as a general question. The grit in this soap is awesome, it's exactly what I've been looking for and Needed as a good replacement for some other soaps I've used. Good size bar, smells fanfingtastic, nice clean feel. Most importantly rinses off easy.
customer_reviews.author: JSkiff

customer_reviews.title: A house favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a filler gift for my husbands birthday. He’s really picky about the soaps he uses and prefers mostly charcoal soaps, tea tree, and higher end companies. I honestly bought this just so he had something else to open and it quickly became his absolute favorite soap and mine too! It is highly exfoliating and feels like a nice massage with every use. The scent is outstanding but not overpowering or musky. It has a very light woodsy scent and leaves your Skin feeling brand new and squeaky clean. After purchasing once I immediately turned around and bought two more bars. If you’re looking for an highly exfoliating soap this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Catelin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He frequently comes home covered in grease, oil and whatever else you could imagine from driving and working on a truck. This stuff works. My only complaint is that the smell is amazing, but faint. Doesn't linger. No biggie. For serious blue collar work related dirt, one bar lasts maybe two weeks. Worth the buy!! Makes Gojo hand cleaner look like water.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Heath

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: Like washing with 100 grit sandpaper. It's worse than the bar of Lava we used to use to get rid of dirt from working on cars or in the yard. Not crazy about the scent either.
customer_reviews.author: M. Steinhorn

customer_reviews.title: Great soap after a long day
customer_reviews.text: As a guy who works with industrial machines I get really dirty. This soap makes me feel clean after a long day. The soap is very aggressive with it's exfoliating scrub and that is what makes the difference. It easily removes oil, grease, and grime. The smell is clean with a little wood not too masculine. Definitely will always have one in my shower. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mens soap
customer_reviews.text: So I've been using this and a certain Bourbon Cedar bar soap for over a year now and I've got to say that they are great. You get a good, thorough cleanse with this bar, while leaving behind a pleasant but not overpowering sent. However, if you have weak skin, you should stay away... this is not for you. For those that are not prone to easy abrasion, this is a great product that I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I've always went with body wash, but got tired of the overwhelming artificial scents. Bought this based on the reviews, and can't say enough. The 1st shower is like washing with sandpaper but you quickly learn to love the pain. I have mildly dry skin and after a week of using this soap I hardly need lotion. I've noticed that my face looks healthier, has more of a shine, and I feel fresher throughout the day. A properly stored bar is looking like it will last me about 2 or 3 weeks with every day use. I figure it'll cost me an extra $8-$10 per month but it's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say “Not recommended”. Just used once then set aside. I would rather using a rough towel which may be more efficient and acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Lee

customer_reviews.title: Never going back!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely 180 grit sandpaper BUT just scrub gently? I mean come on? Skin has never felt so soft. Hoping it works for bacne, will update. Creamy lather. Not sure how long bar will last but probably will update. As for now, YUP. Showers are tolerable but know you’re getting a rough bar of soap.
customer_reviews.author: D N

customer_reviews.title: Big Ol Bar of Soap!
customer_reviews.text: When I first unboxed this I was impressed with how beefy the bar of soap was. I've been buying some other bars of soap on amazon lately and this one is huge! I like the exfoliating quality of the soap, it's a bit on the rough side but I prefer that with soaps. Smells great and I'm sure will last for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Soap
customer_reviews.text: Lasts a long time, exfoliates so much that you wish it didn’t exfoliate so much. Not going to bore your with tutorial on how to use soap, but it’s been my favorite soap so far since I’ve lived. Really gets ya clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler F

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't be afraid of the soap....it works wonders! Love the scent and the power of clean. Don't know who created this but they got it right. The most effective scrub soap I have ever used. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela White Burrage

customer_reviews.title: Extremely exfoliating
customer_reviews.text: Great scent, not overpowering. Leaves you feeling clean, but not dried out. The nubbins they put in the bar for exfoliation are very effective, almost too much so. If you rub the bar directly on your skin, you feel like you could strip paint with it. If you lather in your hands, then rub on your skin it was less aggresive.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdneck

customer_reviews.title: Awesome exfoliater!
customer_reviews.text: This soap has a more masculine/clean scent, but is not a super manly scent. I think this is an amazing exfoliater. I use this soap on my upper arms where I have keratosis pilaris and I notice a huge difference in my skin appearance when I consitently use this product. It’s definitely a rough exfoliater, so be prepared for some grit.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Warren

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Soap!
customer_reviews.text: For the longest time, I have searched for a super soap. One that is clean and fresh, but not overly stinky with perfume. This soap is fresh and it really cleans your body SUPER well! I like this product. It is high quality and it lasts and lasts for the price. I plan on trying the Marlo Black soap next. I recommend it if you want a product that does the job and does it well.
customer_reviews.author: OK Tamease

customer_reviews.title: Best scrub, enjoy the grit, it s there
customer_reviews.text: By far the best soap for a good scrub. I’ve tried oatmeal and charcoal, tallow and every oil
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: This soap smells really good and it's very light scent after use, doesn't leave me feeling oily but not dry either, its however way to coarse to use the bar directly against your skin, its feels like 60 grit sand paper, works awesome with a wash cloth though, its yet to be scene how long it lasts but if it lasts a decent time I'll definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Pitters

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy both the products but use the soap more often. The fragrance is nice not to strong and the pumice or whatever it may be in the soap is very nice on the skin especially very dry skin. Would recommend hence the purchase of three after my first bar was halfway gone!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice Smelling Big Bar of Soap!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd bar of this soap I've gotten. It is a big bar of soap like more then twice as big as a normal bar of soap with natural scribbles in it. I got the original scent the first time around and it has a strong pine scent almost like pinesol. I like this scent a bit better. I got it for my husband but I love it too now!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya K.

customer_reviews.title: Get this Awesome soap!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome soap. First time I've thought about soap since Irish Spring in high school. Soap smells great. Exfoliates skin very well. I'll be a lifetime customer now. Feel and smell great after using Marlowe soap. Highest recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: Coltrane

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Get this.
customer_reviews.text: My husband only likes Irish Spring soap and I don’t especially the smell. So I searched for a good one and I found this. Some guys don’t really exfoliate, so told him to use this and shockingly he likes it! Smell is great and works great, it’s probably his first time exfoliating.. this soap is hardcore. Haha
customer_reviews.author: J.C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This product is incredible. I have a very dry skin because of the cold weather an my skin is glowing one more time. It’s exfoliating structure helps restore your skin. Also, the fragrance is excellent not too strong, not to soft tha vanishes. I recommend this product 100%. Its worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Adorno

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic exfoliating soap
customer_reviews.text: As a guy, I don't have an extensive skincare routine or anything. I can do simple, though, and that's what this soap is. It's simple and it seems to work well for my skin. I feel very clean and my skin seems healthier than when I used other soaps. -1 star just for the price, but still recommend Marlowe.
customer_reviews.author: danny khamsy

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliater
customer_reviews.text: I'm very allergic to stuff, and this mildly breaks my face out if I use it too much. It works fine on the rest of my skin. It is a great exfoliater due to the little rough pieces, like sand paper particles. You may want to follow this with a mild moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: ClaytonTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised with this. Compared to all other "scrub" bars except for Kiehl's this is a TRUE scrub. You need almost no pressure. I love it. The smell is intoxicating as well. Still determining how long a bar will last. Will update if it goes prematurely.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Learned another skill: Building a cabin in the woods.
customer_reviews.text: The Wife: That smells nice. Me: This bar of godliness feels like a bear rubbing against a tree in the forest. It almost feels like a belt sander on low and breezy is gently caressing my back. The smell alone makes me want to wear a lumberjack shirt and invest in a chainsaw. The single best stocking filler I have ever received, although now my wife has to fend off the other women following my scent home.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great Exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase after reading the reviews but that would have been a big mistake. I absolutely love this soap. My skin never felt better. Yes the soap is rough, it's an exfoliating bar! If you are looking for a great bar at a great value this is the product for you. Hands down the best I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn K.

customer_reviews.title: Buy buy buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and I probably use it more than him. It smells like a Christmas tree and the exfoliation is amazing. Loooove this. Y’all need to make more scents!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great Exfoliating Bar Soap
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bar soap if you're looking for something with a solid exfoliating scrub. It doesn't over dry, does a great job at cleaning, and has a nice masculine scent. I've also found it to last longer than some competing brands, as it's a large, dense bar. However, if you aren't into a rougher bar of soap, this may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: S. Deputron

customer_reviews.title: I love this - I ordered one, then after finishing it, I ordered two more bars.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this soap. I use it after working in the yard or sweating a lot. The scrubbing beads are wonderful. The scent is light which is great for a man or anyone with allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing exfoliating soap :)
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the scent of this soap and the way it makes me feel while showering. The exfoliating quality feels so good to the touch. After the first shower I have logged back on to Amazon to order 6 more bars. Truly the best shower I have had. I highly recommend you give this soap a try.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliation: 10/10, Everything else: not so much
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get me wrong, this soap smells great in the shower, but I find the scent doesn’t linger as long as you’d think for how much it cost. It also dries out my skin like cheaper bars of Castile soap. I’m a darker complexion and it leaves me dry to the point that I’m ashy. All of that being said, you buy this for the exfoliation and it definitely delivers in that aspect. I feel cleaner than regular bottled soap when I get out of the shower, and I like that feeling. If that is what attracted you to this soap, I imagine there are better alternatives out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: MARLOWE. No. 102 Men's Body Scrub Soap 7 oz (3 Bars) | Best Exfoliating Bar for Men | Made with Natural Ingredients | Green Tea Extract | Amazing Scent
feature_bullets: SCRUB IT AWAY: This exfoliating body soap helps to scrub away dryness for smooth, clean skin.

EXPERIENCE THE MARLOWE DIFFERENCE: This bar is crafted with our proprietary Marlowe. M Blend: a unique natural formulation of passionflower fruit, green tea, and willow bark extracts designed to nourish, smooth, and revitalize skin.
SMELL AWESOME: This bath soap is lightly scented with agarwood, followed by balance of sandalwood and musk. It's truly unique - try it!
NO BAD STUFF & MADE RIGHT HERE: Paraben and phthalate-free, glycerin-based, cruelty-free (not tested on animals), and made in the USA.
DO MORE GOOD: For every Marlowe. item purchased, soap is distributed to people at risk for hygiene-related illnesses in partnership with Clean the World.
